casebody.data:
No. 10-617. Scott Roberts, Petitioner v. Kauffman Racing Equipment, L.L.C. 564 U.S. 1053, 131 S. Ct. 3089,

180 L. Ed. 2d 913,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 5014. June 28, 2011.

Motion of Center for Democracy & Technology for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Ohio denied.

Same case below, 126 Ohio St. 3d 81, 930 N.E.2d 784.
